title: Gift alert: This 1-Year Gold Star Costco Membership and $40 Digital Costco Shop Card* is only $60
content:
Macworld

Give yourself the gift of an easier shopping experience this holiday season and well beyond with this deal on a 1-year Costco Gold Star membership that comes with a $40 Digital Costco Shop Card*. Costco members can access incredible savings on various products, including electronics, holiday items, everyday household goods and groceries, and much more. 

What better timing than before the holiday shopping season to get situated with a Costco membership? When you join, you can enjoy a convenient online and in-store shopping experience (there are more than 500 brick-and-mortar Costco locations in the United States!).

Besides member-only savings, Costco members can enjoy other Costco Services*. Stop by the Costco Tire Center to install brand-name tires on your car or fill up your tank at a Costco Gas Station after shopping for gifts and groceries.

If you or a loved one are looking to travel more affordably this holiday season, you may be able to find travel deals through Costco. You could discover comprehensive resort packages, a couple’s trip to Bora Bora, or cruise fare.

This holiday season, give the gift of Costco to yourself or a loved one.

Get a Costco One-Year Gold Star Membership with a $40 Digital Costco Shop Card* for just $60. This offer ends December 10th at 11:59 p.m. PT.

 

Costco 1-Year Gold Star Membership + a $40 Digital Costco Shop Card* – $60

Start Saving Now!

Prices subject to change.

*To receive a Digital Costco Shop Card, you must provide a valid email address at the time of sign-up. If you elect not to provide a valid email address, a Digital Costco Shop Card will not be emailed. Valid only for nonmembers for their first year of membership. Limit one per household. Nontransferable and may not be combined with any other promotion. New members will receive their Digital Costco Shop Card by email within 2 weeks of sign-up. Costco Shop Cards are not redeemable for cash, except as required by law. Digital Costco Shop Cards are not accepted at Gas Stations, Car Washes, or Food Court Kiosks. A Costco membership is $60 a year. An Executive Membership is an additional $60 upgrade fee a year. Each membership includes one free Household Card. May be subject to sales tax. Costco accepts all Visa cards, as well as cash, checks, debit/ATM cards, EBT and Costco Shop Cards. Departments and product selection may vary.

*Services are provided to Costco members by third parties. 

Accessories
